name: MedicationsForAboveNormalBMI
title: Medications for Above Normal BMI
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent clinical medications prescribed for weight loss to patients with an above normal BMI measurement.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Medication.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with oral drug forms prescribed for weight loss in patients with an above normal BMI measurement.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
